name: tessel-rfid-http
description: A Tessel module for sending rfid events to an endpoint

scripts.build: babel tessel/src config.js -d tessel/lib && cp -r tessel/sounds tessel/lib
scripts.start: npm run build && (cd tessel; t2 run lib/index.js)
scripts.push: npm run build &&  (cd tessel; t2 push lib/index.js)

author: Christian Lizell <christian.lizell@athega.se> (http://athega.se/)
